{"id":928416337,"question_id":13,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1680693619,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/928416337/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Roman to Integer","memory":"5.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int get_map(char a){\n        if(a=='I'){ return 1; }\n        if(a=='V'){ return 5; }\n        if(a=='X'){ return 10; }\n        if(a=='L'){ return 50; }\n        if(a=='C'){ return 100; }\n        if(a=='D'){ return 500; }\n        if(a=='M'){ return 1000; }\n        return 0;\n    }\n\n    int romanToInt(string s) {\n        int sum = 0;\n        int i = 0;\n\n        while(i<size(s)){\n            \n            if(get_map(s[i]) >= get_map(s[i+1])){\n                sum += get_map(s[i]);\n                i+=1;\n            }\n            else{\n                sum += (get_map(s[i+1]) - get_map(s[i]));\n                i+=2;\n            }\n\n        }\n        return sum;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"roman-to-integer","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
